assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: No ethical review board was involved in this meta-analysis, because public documents are subjects of the study. Data was collected through an unbiased search strategy with well-defined inclusion and exclusion criteria. Data was extracted, analyzed accurately and was tested for bias [CitationRef removed].
